sentences.en: An alternative explanation is defense from predation.
sentences.cn: 另一种解释是防御捕食。

sentences.en: Once rid of predation pressure, large body size is of little advantage to herbivores.
sentences.cn: 一旦摆脱了捕食压力，大体型对食草动物来说几乎没有优势。

sentences.en: Once free from predation pressure, large body size is of little advantage to herbivores.
sentences.cn: 一旦摆脱了捕食的压力，巨大的体型对食草动物没有什么好处。
